metadata.synopsis: One shot voicebark in the Lower City. One origin character remarks something while passing through an area, then three other origins may respond to that remark. The respondents are prioritized from top to bottom. If none of the respondents are available, this won't play.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to S_LOW_OneShotVB_Minsc_OnlyWhenCooked_Trigger_325f99d9-e33b-4e2c-b00f-94866d698504 near the Sahuagin attack beach/Lower City entrance waypoint, with the initiator + one the respondents in your party

1.speaker: Minsc
1.text: |Smells like fish. I like fish, but only when cooked.|

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Duly noted. If I ever make it to the Blade Kingdoms, I'll fetch you some singing fish. Simmered in wine, served with orange rind - you'd think you'd reached an eighth heaven.
